sentences.sContent: The fishing industry is very important to the area.
sentences.sCn: 捕鱼业对于该地区非常重要。

sentences.sContent: The traffic’s moving very slowly this morning.
sentences.sCn: 今天早上车流非常缓慢。

sentences.sContent: problems that are very similar to mine
I feel a lot better – thank you very much.
sentences.sCn: 我感觉好多了，非常感谢。

sentences.sContent: I’m very, very (= used for emphasis ) pleased you can come.
sentences.sCn: 你能来我真是非常高兴。

sentences.sContent: It’s very kind of you to help.
My sister and I were married on the very same (= exactly the same ) day.
sentences.sCn: 我和姐姐在同一天结婚。

synos.tran: 恰好是，正是；甚至；十足的；特有的

phrases.pCn: 最初；就在刚刚开始；在刚开始的时候；起初；在一开始

trans.tranOther: used to emphasize an adjective, adverb, or phrase
used to emphasize that you are talking exactly about one particular thing or person
